title: Contemporary 6-Bed Ochota Investment Home with Designer Touches
description: Discover a spacious contemporary house boasting 6 generously sized bedrooms and 3 chic bathrooms, spanning an impressive 260 square meters. Carefully designed with modern architecture, this property features an eye-catching façade and expansive interiors ideal for flexible living or co-living setups. Thoughtful amenities such as a rainwater collection system and panoramic windows maximize eco-conscious comfort and natural light throughout. Landscaped private surroundings offer a relaxing outdoor retreat within the dynamic city mojo.
neighborhood_description: Nestled in Warsaw’s vibrant Ochota district, this home combines prime urban living with tranquility. The area enjoys quick connections via public transport, extensive bike paths, rapid access to Chopin Airport, and streamlined routes to highways, making it a savvy locale for getting around Warsaw or further afield. You’ll relish Ochota’s balanced lifestyle, dotted with green spaces, dynamic eateries, and proximity to key business hubs.
lifestyle_benefits: few minute walk to transport nodes
energy-efficient systems appealing to eco-conscious tenants
space for up to 3 home offices
target_buyer: Ideal for modern property investors targeting the professional rental market, business commuters, or families seeking a strategic Warsaw base with passive income potential.
market_positioning: High-end, versatile investment with rare size and design tailored for urban professionals and multi-generational families in one of Ochota’s most coveted residential quarters.
